fetch_news(keyword: str='') -> pd.DataFr:
"""
        Strach news from internet, the keyword is the keyword of the news, the language is the language of the news, the days is the days of the news, the default is 100 days.
        Args:
   - keyword: The keyword of the news
    - language: The language of the news
    - days: The days of the news

        Returns:
        - pd.DataFrame: A dataframe that contains the news title, news content, news url, news source, news publish time
 """
preprocess_text(df: pd.DataFrame, input_:
"""
        Preprocess the text, remove the stop words and the punctuation.
        Args:
   - df: The dataframe to be preprocessed
   - input_column: The column name of the text to be preprocessed
   - output_column: The column name of the preprocessed text

        Returns:
        - pd.DataFrame: A dataframe that contains the news title, news content, news url, news source, news publish time
 """
